trans-unit.source: Represents errors that occur when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control parses values to create a query.
trans-unit.target: 表示所發生錯誤時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref>控制項剖析的值，建立查詢。

trans-unit.source: The ParseException object contains information about exceptions that occur when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control parses values in order to dynamically create a query.
trans-unit.target: ParseException 物件包含發生的例外狀況的相關資訊時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項值剖析才能以動態方式建立查詢。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property includes a property that is not in the data object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control raises a ParseException exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性包含此屬性，在 資料物件不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項引發 ParseException 例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message indicates that the property does not exist in the data object.
trans-unit.target: 訊息指出該屬性不存在於資料物件。

trans-unit.source: You can assign the data object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property to an object that is returned from a query.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指派中的資料物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>藉由設定事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性從查詢傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: If you select a property that does not exist in the data object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control raises a ParseException exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選取此屬性不存在，在 資料物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制項引發 ParseException 例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The message indicates that the particular property does not exist in an `AnonymousType` object.
trans-unit.target: 訊息會指出特定的屬性不存在於`AnonymousType`物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Query.Dynamic.ParseException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Query.Dynamic.ParseException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Gets the location of the error.
The location where the exception occurred.
Returns the error message and the location of the error.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的錯誤訊息和錯誤的位置。

trans-unit.source: The message and the position of the error.
